name: Mini Miner (CreekWorks)
description:
This game is part of the Bullet Hell Jam 🎆 Bullet Hell Jam 🎆 - itch.io

In this SNES style game you fight off the gem monsters and collect them to raise your score!

Controls

     Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys

     Shoot - Mouse or Space

     Duck - Control

Music

     Music used from https://www.FesliyanStudios.com

I made this in two days... I don't know if I should be proud or sad.
